Purchase Method:: The equipment to be purchased is generally described as follows, Outdoor type, free-standing, single-phase, oil insulated, with energized components supported by either a porcelain or polymer insulating column, with H1 and H2 line terminals, and secondary terminal box(es) for conduit entrance and secondary circuit connections. The Material will be received and installed by an installation contractor under a separate contract.
